ygData.subject: Where to hunt at 21?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all.  After having spent two and a half weeks at 20 (is this a hell level or what?) I have finally made 21st level.  I made most the exp from 20 out in
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all. After having spent two and a half weeks at 20 (is this a hell level or what?) I have finally made 21st level. I made most the exp from 20 out in Oasis killing DW but the exp is getting a bit thin. I was wondering if anyone can give me a good idea on where to solo w/pet at 21 and get good exp (yes, I would like to powerlevel to 24). I know all the obvious spots like Treants and Aviak Tower in SK, but I am looking for someplace not so camped. Any help would be appreciated. Thanks in advance.

Branil Myrlochar
21st Circle DE Necro
Reflections of Power
Quellious
